title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat with local LLMs from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Integrate local LLMs into Node or browser apps.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that adds Ollama models as LLM or chat providers in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface). Runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI wrapper around the Ollama REST API with history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama. Simple DSL for chat, completions, and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLMs into any Discord server via Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama models in production.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chat UI that streams responses from any Ollama model.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent wrapper around the Ollama API with queue support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama with Tokio and native TLS. Includes CLI example.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses local Ollama models to summarize notes and answer vault questions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component and demo app for chatting with Ollama models in a few lines of Python.

title: ollama-nginx
summary: Nginx configuration templates for exposing Ollama securely with rate limiting and auth.
